General.Name: Sunnic Technology & Merchandise
General.Description: Sunnic Technology & Merchandise Inc provides image processing and optoelectronic products in Taiwan. It offers products ranging from semiconductors, and solutions and modules, as well as systems to factory automation equipment. The company also provides solutions for exterior, mechanism, software, hardware, and firmware designs, as well as one-stop shopping services. Its product research and development cover various products and applications that include CCD and CMOS analog, and digital HD smart cameras for image capture and blue-ray; H.264 IP set top box and IP smart TV box for image storage; HD smart displays and internet TV for image display; and Wi-Fi, RF, and 3GPP for video conferencing and image transmission. Sunnic Technology & Merchandise Inc was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
